scripts.dev:mongo: docker run -d -v volume_database:/data/db --name mongo-container --network my_custom_network -p 27017:27017 mongo
scripts.dev:d4r: docker run --name dev-tools-studio-backend-dev-container --network my_custom_network -v volume_database:/data/db --env-file ./src/config/environments/dev.env -p 3000:3000 dev-tools-studio-backend:v1.0.0
scripts.start:d4r: docker run --name dev-tools-studio-backend-prod-container --network my_custom_network -v volume_database:/data/db --env-file ./src/config/environments/prod.env -p 3000:3000 dev-tools-studio-backend:v1.0.0
scripts.start:d4r:d: docker run --name dev-tools-studio-backend-prod-container --network my_custom_network -v volume_database:/data/db -d -p 3000:3000 dev-tools-studio-backend:v1.0.0
